评论详情: Literally the cheapest made shirt you could ever buy. I knew I was taking a risk with this one since it was last minute for a trip, and I lost. Cheap swimsuit material with a low quality iron on plastic design. Please for the love of God save yourself the money.
The quality of this t shirt was way better than I expected! It washed just fine and the size is just perfect !
Got this just for fun for Fourth of July. A couple people asked me where it was from! It’s very cute and comfy. Love how the design is different
Bought this shirt for Bonnaroo and it was a surprise of how much I love this shirt. It is super soft and not at all see through. Would for sure buy again!
Shirt is very cute. Not see through or too too cheap. The decal looks just like the picture online, it is a grainy image of cherries but I like it. Don’t rip the tag off or you’ll rip the shirt lol
Perfect fit even on a tall teen.  Fabric is soft and breathable.  True to size.  Worn to the Cherry Festival.  Received lots of compliments on vibrant colors.  Washed well and didn’t shrink.

评论概述: Design is cute but looks nothing like the fit of the photo.
评论详情: I thought the shirt would be more baby tee/tight around the stomach, expect it’s more like a loose crop top. Soft though.
this shirt is so cute! don’t really love the material but i will still be wearing it!
It is short but nice fabric feels good too the skin

评论概述: Not what we were hoping for...
评论详情: Top is true to size, but material is thin and see through. Cherries have a strange pixilation to them and kind of resemble boobs. They also feel like vinyl and were more than likely attached with a heat press. Cheap quality!!!!

This is a true baby tee. I’m a size 10/12 and normally wear an XL. I purchased and it fit like a youth large. The fabric is 95/5% poly/ spandex. it’s thick soft and stretchy good quality T-shirt fabric. unfortunately it was waaay too small for me, the sleeves and body silhouette are cut like a true 90s baby tee and it would be best suited for petite women. The graphic printed is good quality and has an intentional pixelated CMYK style print. I wish it fit me!
